root.name: Clonk Endeavour
root.description: OverviewClonk Endeavour is a multiplayer focused, 2D real-time strategy game. Players control creatures called Clonks to gather resources and fight opponents on procedurally generated maps. The focus of the game is on gathering different types of resources by digging into the random landscape.The game has a single player component where players fight against bots, but is mainly set up for multiplayer, either locally or online. However, as the sequel to this game, Clonk Rage, has come out, it has become much harder to find players online. System RequirementsPC, 500MHz CPU, 128MB RAMWindows 2000/XPDirect3D 8.1 or OpenGL capable graphics board with 32MB or more of video memoryUp-to-date graphics drivers
